column2:
"Confirmed a large number
of heat sources. Please,
proceed with caution."

"Detecting a high density of
geomagnetic fluctuations.
Please, prepare for contingencies."

"Detected a large number
of moving targets! Please
be on the lookout nearby!"

"We're picking up a large number
of readings! Please, pay attention
to your surroundings!"

"Picking up a large number
of readings! Please, be
extra careful in this area!"

"We're getting readings from a
target we need to investigate!"

"Confirmed readings from a
target we need to investigate.
Please, be aware of contingencies!"

"A target we need to investigate
may be lurking in the vicinity.
Please, bear this in mind."

"An extremely powerful heat source
has been detected! Please, be careful!"

"Confirmed strange heat source
readings! Don't let your guard down!"

"A powerful heat source is
approaching! Please, pay attention!"

"There seem to be ARKS engaged
in combat in the nearby area."

"ARKS appear to be engaged
in battle in the area."

"Combat readings? There seem
to be ARKS in the area..."
"/face6 What are these tiny readings...?"

"/face6 I wonder what these
tiny readings are...?"

"It might be nothing, but we've
confirmed some tiny readings."

"The Photon coefficient is
climbing! Watch out for Darkers!"

"Environmental patterns are on the
rise! Please, be cautious of Darkers!"

"Spacial pattern estimates are
fluctuating! Beware of Darkers!"

"Something is odd about this enemy
activity. Please, be careful."

"Something strange is going
on amongst the enemy forces.
Please, bear this in mind."

"There's something strange
about this enemy activity.
Something might be happening."

"System malfunctions detected!
Be aware of malfunctioning
defense equipment!"

"Error code detected!
Please be mindful of
malfunctions and the like!"

"Abnormal behavior has been
confirmed! Pay attention to the
behavior of defense equipment!"

"Some spots around here
don't have a stable footing.
Please, watch your step."

"We don't know what keeps the
Skyscape in the air, so be prepared
to lose your footing at any moment"

"Be sure to keep track of both your
location and that of stable ground."

"It seems this area is similar
to the Skyscape area."

"I'm getting abnormal readings
from the flooring here."

"/face6 This is such a mysterious
planet. How can rocks
float in the sky like that?"

"I've picked up indications of
rare insect fossils in the area."

"We have intel that suggests unusual
insect fossils are around here, but..."

"There are lots of insect fossils
in this area, so numerous survey
missions are being carried out."

"These readings are all over
the place... Just what is this?
Something feels wrong here."

"Strange readings all over the place...
What in the world is this?"

"These readings are odd...
It's like Darkers... but small."

"There are many valuable
resources in this area."

"/face2 This is definitely a resource-
rich planet. We're picking up
incredible readings everywhere."

"We're getting readings from
resources, just like the rumors said."

"Detecting Photon readings
nearby. Seems like they're
coming from the ground."

"Photon readings nearby.
They're... in the ground?"

"There's Photon readings in the area.
They're coming from the ground."

"Seems like the equipment around
you is still functioning. Please,
don't let your guard down."

"The equipment here is still
functioning. Watch out for
things happening around you."

"Confirmed that equipment is
operational. Please, be careful."

"Readings from targets to
capture have been detected!"

"Spotted readings from
targets to capture!"

"Getting readings from
targets to capture nearby!"

"Spotted an unknown heat
source! Please take care!"

"Confirmed unidentified heat
source! Please pay attention!"

"There's an unidentified heat
source present! Please be careful!"

"It seems that recently, there
have been reports of Lillipans
directly interacting with ARKS."

"I wonder what it's like to
communicate with a Lillipan..."

"We're looking into it, but
there's still a lot we don't
know about the Lillipans."

"Your destination is beyond
that gate, but it appears to
be under Darker influence."

"The portal to the next area is
up ahead. Be careful, I'm picking
up strong enemy readings."

"The portal is close, but something
doesn't seem right. Be careful."

"The coast area has many Shell
Flowers. How these strange plants
came to evolve is entirely unknown."

"The Shell Flowers scattered
throughout the area behave
differently between night
and day. Be careful."

"The Shell Flowers are quite
strange. It's hard to believe
such things can occur naturally."

"Lillipan settlements have
been confirmed in the vicinity
of the abandoned quarry."

"Water sources have been confirmed
in the vicinity of the abandoned
quarry. That must be why the
Lillipans made their settlements here."

"The Mechs seem to attack the
Lillipan settlements often. If you
encounter any settlements under
attack, please lend them aid."

"A lot of junk seems to be
scattered throughout the area."

"It's common to see Lillipans
scavenging in the junk. I
wonder what they're looking for."

"Maybe all this junk that's useless
to us is precious to the Lillipans."

"/face1 Looks like there's native lifeforms
nearby. What are they doing here?"

"/face1 It seems that this area is home to
natural predators for the native
lifeforms. They prefer to avoid it."

"/face1 This reading... are there
native lifeforms nearby?"

"/face1 Amorphous creatures are
falling from the ceiling in
large clusters nearby."

"/face1 We're detecting unusual
amorphous creatures."

"/face1 Picking up a biological
reading. There's something
amorphous above you...?"

"Seems like there's ARKS nearby.
But this reading is a little strange..."

"Seems like there's ARKS nearby.
But this reading is a little strange..."

"Two ARKS signatures nearby. It
looks like they're in a party, but
something is off about this reading..."

"...No, there's nothing to worry
about. Carry on as you were,
and assist them if you can."
"Variation Test1"
"Variation Test2"
"Variation Test3"

"It's weak, but we've confirmed
enemy readings. The Shironians
seem to be preparing to sortie.
Please be careful."

"It's weak, but we've confirmed
enemy readings. The Shironians
are also on alert. Everyone, be
aware of changes in the situation."

"We've confirmed weak
enemy readings. The Shironians
seem to be on the move.
Everyone, please be careful."

"What is this reading?
A mysterious signature has been
confirmed. Please be cautious."

"Picking up an unidentified
reading. It's not Darkers...
Please keep it in mind."

"Abnormal energy signatures
have been appearing and
disappearing! Please be careful."
"Variation Test1"
"Variation Test2"
"Variation Test3"
"テスト１"
"テスト２"
"テスト３"

"We're detecting someone nearby.
It seems humanoid...
but not quite like an ARKS operative...?"

"Detecting ARKS readings
engaged in battle nearby."

"Picking up readings in your
area. There seem to be ARKS
engaged in combat nearby."

"Detecting nearby readings. There
seem to be ARKS engaged in battle."

"Detecting ARKS readings
engaged in battle nearby."

"Picking up readings in your
area. There seem to be ARKS
engaged in combat nearby."

"Detecting nearby readings. There
seem to be ARKS engaged in battle."

"Two ARKS signatures nearby. It
looks like they're in a party, but
something is off about this reading..."

"Lightning has been observed in the
vicinity. This amount of lightning
isn't normal! Remain vigilant."

"A powerful electrical discharge
has been detected. It may be
related to the Kuronites. Pay
attention to your surroundings!"

"We're detecting a very strong
electric field! Keep a close eye
on your surroundings!"

"Two ARKS signatures nearby. It
looks like they're in a party, but
something is off about this reading..."

"Two ARKS signatures nearby. It
looks like they're in a party, but
something is off about this reading..."

"Detecting a reading, but it doesn't
seem hostile. We've received reports
of sightings of a large shadow.
Pay attention to your surroundings!"

"There's a great number
of moving heat sources.
Don't get careless now."

"Detecting a large number of moving
heat sources. Watch yourselves."

"Confirmed a large number of
readings. Be on the lookout."

"Got readings from a target
we need to investigate.
Be alert, it might show up."

"Confirmed readings from a target
we need to investigate. I'll contact
you again when I know the details."

"I've come across readings from a
target we need to investigate. Keep
a close eye on events around you."

"We've confirmed a strange heat
source. Be careful, it's huge."

"Confirmed readings from a strange
heat source. This thing's huge!"

"Getting powerful heat source
readings from this thing. Don't
let your guard down, this is huge."
"This signal... Are there other ARKS?"

"There are signs of battle in the
surrounding area. Other ARKS
might be around somewhere."

"Are other ARKS engaged in
combat? Be careful, just in case."
"What are these tiny readings?"

"These readings... A person?
...No, it's too small for that."

"I don't think I'm imagining this...
Just what are these tiny readings?"

"These spacial pattern
estimates... Darkers?"

"Hmm... the signs are pointing
to a Darker outbreak."

"Environmental patterns are
changing... Are Darkers inbound?"

"There's odd enemy activity...
Be careful, just in case."

"Enemy activity is strange.
Don't let your guard down."

"Getting strange enemy readings...
Something might be up, stay vigilant."

"Tch, the system broke
down? Careful, defense
systems are malfunctioning."

"A system error... What a pain.
Pay attention to the behaviour
of the defense systems."

"...System's destabilized. Watch out
for defense system activity."

"Normal common sense
doesn't apply in the Skyscape.
Watch where you step."

"Anything can happen around here.
Footing's not stable either. Careful."

"Be careful, it looks like even more
of the ground is likely to fall away."

"This place seems as unstable
as the rest of the Skyscape.
Watch your footing."

"Be careful! Just like the
Skyscape, the flooring
can give way at any time."

"The floors are unstable here. The fall
won't be bad, but please be careful."

"Oh, yes, come to think of it,
there appear to be rare insect
fossils or something in the area."

"Did you know? Unusual insect
fossils or something appear to
have been discovered in the area."

"Looks like there are occasional
surveys searching for things like
rare insect fossils around here."

"The readings are going
to pieces... What the...?
Is its body breaking apart?"

"Getting strange readings here
and there. Are they... Darkers?
No, they're smaller than that."

"Strange readings all over the
place. Are these things carrying
something? What is it?"

"Hmm, this planet is indeed rich in
resources. These valuable resource
readings are really something."

"Looks like there's a motherlode
of valuable resources just
lying around in the vicinity."

"These readings... they're not
enemies. I see... we've found
some valuable resources!"

"Detected Photon readings in the
area. Seems to be from the ground."

"Photon readings detected nearby.
They're coming from the ground."

"Confirmed Photon readings close
by... I see, they're from the ground."

"There's readings from
equipment nearby. Careful,
still seems operational."

"The readings from this equipment...
Be careful, and proceed with caution."

"The equipment still seems to be
running. Pay attention. You might
get dragged into something here."

"Detecting readings from
targets we want to capture.
I'll track down the details."

"Confirmed readings from
targets we want to capture.
They might be in the area."

"These readings... they're coming
from close by. Might be from
targets we'd like you to capture."

"Detecting an unknown heat
source. How odd... watch out."

"Confirmed an unknown heat source.
... Careful, something's strange here."

"There's an unidentified
heat source present...
Is someone there?"

"It seems there have been lots
of reports of Lillipans directly
interacting with ARKS lately."
"I wonder how Lillipans communicate..."

"/face6 Lillipans, huh? I wonder how they
came to live on this planet?"

"The gate to the next area is nearby.
I'm picking up strong readings at the
same location. It's Darker influence..."

"The way to the next area is
up ahead. Picking up readings
of Darker-influenced enemies."

"I'm picking up a lot of Dragonkin.
They're surrounding the gate,
and they're being influenced by
Darkers. Could be a problem."

"The coast area is covered in these
mysterious plant-like Shell Flowers."

"Shell Flowers change their
behavior between night and
day. If you're clever, you can
use them to hurt enemies, too."

"I don't think these flowers
are natural. They look almost
as if they've been twisted
from their original form."

"This should definitely be
the area where the Lillipans
established settlements."

"The Lillipans must have settled
here because there's water in
the area. On a planet like this,
water will be precious."

"There are a few reports of a
certain monument in the area. It
seems to be a some kind of symbol
to the Lillipans, though we don't
know what it means to them."

"This stuff scattered throughout
the area... it's all just junk."

"All the junk in this area
must look like mountains
of treasure to the Lillipans."

"Recently, there have been many
reports of raids on the Lillipans.
Help them wherever you can."

"/face1 It seems that there's a
natural predator of the
native lifeforms in this area."

"/face1 This reading nearby... It looks like a
native lifeform, but what is it doing?"

"/face1 If you see any of the native
lifeforms being attacked, help them.
That's our responsibility as ARKS."

"/face1 What is this... an amorphous
organism? Keep an eye
on your surroundings."

"/face1 Picking up a strange reading.
Check your surroundings."

"/face1 Picking up an unstable reading...
Be careful, you might run into it."

"We're detecting nearby ARKS. However,
the energy reading feels off...
Keep your guard up."

"We're detecting nearby ARKS. However,
the energy reading feels off...
Please keep it in mind."

"Two ARKS signatures nearby. It
looks like they're in a party, but
something is off about this reading..."

"...No, there's nothing to worry
about. Carry on as you were,
and assist them if you can."

"These abnormal parameters... Are
they coming from those lanterns?
Be careful, something's up."

"Abnormal readings confirmed
from the city's lanterns.
...Be careful. We have no
idea what could happen."

"Everyone, watch out. Nothing's
happened yet, but we're
detecting abnormal readings
from the city's lanterns."

"Enemy readings are increasing. The
Shironians are preparing to sortie.
Everyone, be ready to meet them."

"Enemy reading confirmed. Something
may be approaching. Be wary.
The Shironians are also on alert."

"The Shironians seem to be
on the move. Is this an enemy
reading...? Be careful out there."

"What a mysterious reading... It's not
an enemy, but it's not an ally either.
For the time being, stay wary."

"Picking up a reading...
It's a strange one,
alright. Keep it in mind."

"Picking up a strange reading in
the area. Sorry to be so vague,
but \"strange\" is all I've got. All
ARKS, stay on the alert."

"Picking up a high-energy
reading from the sea. Something
might be about to emerge.
Don't let your guard down."

"Picking up a high-energy
reading from the sea. Something
might be about to emerge.
Don't let your guard down."

"Picking up a high-energy
reading from the sea. Something
might be about to emerge.
Don't let your guard down."

"何が潜んでいるのか……？
強力な反応が確認されている。
各員、気を付けて動け。"

"何が潜んでいるのか……？
強力な反応が確認されている。
各員、気を付けて動け。"

"何が潜んでいるのか……？
強力な反応が確認されている。
各員、気を付けて動け。"

"周囲に人の反応を感知……
だが、アークスとは異なるか？
一応、留意しておけ。"

"周囲にアークスの反応を感知……
戦闘中のようだな。
一応、留意しておけ。"

"交戦中のアークスがいるようだな。
周辺に反応がある。
念のため、留意しておけ。"

"アークスの反応を感知した。
周辺で戦闘中のようだ。注意しておけ。"

"周囲にアークスの反応を感知……
戦闘中のようだな。
一応、留意しておけ。"

"交戦中のアークスがいるようだな。
周辺に反応がある。
念のため、留意しておけ。"

"アークスの反応を感知した。
周辺で戦闘中のようだ。注意しておけ。"

"近くにアークスの反応が二つあるな。
パーティを組んでいるようだが……
どうも妙な感じがするな。"

"光源の明滅現象を確認した。
黒の民の動きにも違和感がある。
各員、警戒を怠るなよ。"

"光源が作為的に消されているようだな。
現段階での目的は不明だが、意味のない
動きではなさそうだ。油断するなよ。"

"黒の民の動きが妙だな……
光源低下と関係があるかもしれん。
各員、注意しておけ。"

"近くにアークスの反応が二つあるな。
パーティを組んでいるようだが……
どうも妙な感じがするな。"

"近くにアークスの反応が二つあるな。
パーティを組んでいるようだが……
どうも妙な感じがするな。"

"敵性反応ではない反応を検知した。
周辺で巨大な影の目撃報告もきている。
注意を怠るなよ。"

"We're seeing many moving readings!
Please be careful!"

"Umm, there's a lot of readings?
Be careful, be really careful!"

"T-these readings! Something's heading this way!
...Probably!"

"/face2 調査対象の反応びんびんです！
これは来ちゃう！\u3000来ちゃうかも！"

"/face2 おおっ、これはいいですよー！
調査対象の反応があります！"

"/face2 いーい反応出てますよー！
調査対象さん、そのまま来て－！"

"Wow, what an incredible heat
source! P-please be careful!"

"What... What are these readings?
They're incredibly... hot...!"

"This heat source sure
is strange! Please
be extra careful!"

"Hmm... what's this? This signal...
There's someone nearby, possibly?"
"What's this, other ARKS? Maybe they're somewhere close by."
"Are there other ARKS nearby? This signal looks like the real deal!"

"Mm... I wonder what these
tiny little readings are..."

"Oh... What's this? How
strange, I thought I saw
some tiny readings..."

"Mmm... some tiny
readings appeared
and vanished just now..."

"Waaa... these readings,
they're Darkers?"

"Something maybe might be
coming! A great darkness!"

"This is similar to Darkers...
But, not quite like them..."

"Mmm, enemy activity
sure is strange..."

"There's been some suspicious
movement... please be careful."

"I've got a bit of a bad feeling
about this. Please be careful!"

"Wow, the system's
in bad shape... Watch
out for malfunctions!"

"Gah... why can't we control it?
Be mindful of your surroundings!"

"Huh? Huhhh? Huhhhhhhh? I-it may
be malfunctioning or something!"

"Wow, this is really scary!
Please be careful!"

"What the!? The ground over there
seems to be moving on its own!"

"Huh? Didn't we see a landmass
just like that a while back...?"
"Huh? I'm getting a massive reading here!"

"/face2 ま、また勝手に動く足場ですー！
まるでアトラクション！"
"What? There was a strange blip on the map. Something may have changed."

"/face2 Hehe, what do we have here!?
Looks like unusual insect fossils!"

"/face2 Did you know? Did you know?
There seems to be rare
insect fossils around here!"

"/face2 Here's a bit of good news!
There seems to be unusual
insect fossils in the area!"

"/face4 There's solid data here and
there... What it is, I don't know!"

"Strange, are there
rocks shaped like
eggs around there?"

"Sensing readings of some
strange material... It's similar
to Darkers, but it feels different."

"/face2 Wow, these stats are totally
amazing! There's a lot of
valuable resources here!"

"/face2 Here and there...! Incredibly
valuable resource data is
coming from everywhere!"

"/face2 These readings are more than
mere rumor! It feels like valuable resources are just lying around!"

"Ambient Photon readings!
They're from the ground?"

"Nearby Photon readings!
Hm, from the ground, maybe?"

"/face2 Really really strong Photon readings!
Looks like they're from the ground!"

"T-this equipment's
still running! Please
do be careful!"

"It looks like the equipment's still
operational! P-please be careful!"

"These readings... running equipment?
S-something might be happening!"

"We caught readings from
targets we want to capture!
Maybe they'll show themselves!"

"Capture target readings confirmed!
This may just be what we're after!"

"Please be on the lookout!
We've got readings from
targets we want to capture!"

"An unidentified heat source?
P-please, be careful!"

"Unidentified readings
confirmed! S-something may
or may not be coming!"

"There's an unidentified
heat source! What
is this, exactly?"
"Have you heard the rumors? Recently there have been more and more sighting of the Lillipans."
"/face6 I wonder how the Lillipans communicate... Maybe there's someone who can talk to them?"
"/face2 The Lillipans are soooo cuuuuuute! I want to be friends with them!"
"The exit's close. I'm getting a lot of readings, so be careful!"
"Yikes! Is that coming from the gate? I'm reading a number of Darkers closing in, too..."
"The exit is near! Get ready, you may have incoming enemies!"
"There! Those flower-like things scattered all around the coast area! Those are called Shell Flowers!"
"You'll run into Shell Flowers on the coast a lot. They can release poison and burst into flames, so be careful!"
"Shell Flowers are strange plants, aren't they? How they evolved to be able to spew venom and explode is beyond me."
"It looks like there have been a lot of reports coming in about Lillipan settlements getting attacked recently. I'm worried about them."
"Since this area has water, it must be easier for the Lillipans to live here than other places on the planet."
"Since their settlements are so vulnerable, they have to keep moving, but it looks like they've prepared a lot of different sites."
"The Lillipans are pretty handy. They seem to have made tools out of the junk they've gathered."
"This place sure has a lot of junk, doesn't it? These must be mountains of gold to them!"
"It seems that tons of Lillipans have made their homes here! You'll probably run across them from time to time!"
"/face1 Everyone, it seems that something is coming, in this area..."

"/face1 うーん、このあたりには
原生住民のみなさんにとっての
天敵がいるって聞いたようなー……"

"/face1 あれ、こんなところに
原生住民の反応……ってこれ
なんだか危ない感じかも！"

"/face1 このあたりでは、時々ヘンテコなのが
集まって、ぴちゃっと落ちてくることが
あるみたいですよー。"

"/face1 噂に聞くヘンテコなのって
どのぐらいぬめっとしてるんでしょう。
ちょっと気になりますねー。"

"/face1 な、なんだかヘンな反応があります！
これ、どこからだろ……天井？"

"おやおやっ、近くに
他のアークスさんがいるみたいですよ！
……これ、アークスの反応ですよねぇ？"

"おやおやっ、近くに
他のアークスさんがいるみたいですよ！
……これ、アークスの反応ですよねぇ？"

"Two ARKS signatures nearby. It
looks like they're in a party, but
something is off about this reading..."

"...No, there's nothing to worry
about. Carry on as you were,
and assist them if you can."
"Variation Test1"
"Variation Test2"
"Variation Test3"
"Oh my, the Shironians are preparing to sortie. Is something there?"
"Hmmm, is this an enemy reading? The Shironians seem to be wary of it. Everyone, pay attention!"
"Ah, the Shironians are on the move? Maybe there's an enemy...? Everyone, please be careful!"

"んー……なんだかヘンテコな反応……
Darkersではないんですけどー
とにかく、ヘンな反応があります！"

"あっ、何だか反応が出てます！
でもこれ何の反応だかわかりません！
とりあえず、ふわっと注意注意です！"

"周囲に反応があるんですが……
なんだかとってもヘンな反応です。
念のため、気をつけてくださいー！"
"Variation Test1"
"Variation Test2"
"Variation Test3"
"テスト１"
"テスト２"
"テスト３"

"むむむっ、近くになにやら
誰かがいそうな反応ですよ！
……でもこれ、アークスじゃないかも？"

"むむむっ、アークスの反応ですよ！
近くで戦闘しているのかも？"

"どうやら、この周辺で
アークスが戦ってるみたいですよー！
注意してくださーい。"

"あれれ？\u3000この反応……アークスです。
もしかして戦ってるかも！"

"むむむっ、アークスの反応ですよ！
近くで戦闘しているのかも？"

"どうやら、この周辺で
アークスが戦ってるみたいですよー！
注意してくださーい。"

"あれれ？\u3000この反応……アークスです。
もしかして戦ってるかも！"

"おやおやっ、近くにアークスの反応が
二つあるみたいですよー！
でも、ちょっとヘンな反応ですねぇ。"

"わわっ、みなさん大丈夫ですか！？
気温がどんどん下がっていますー！
注意してくださーい！"

"あれ？\u3000あれれれれ？
すごく気温が下がっていってる？
